personalInfo.name: Tran Chi Hieu
personalInfo.title: Frontend Developer
personalInfo.bio: I am a passionate Frontend Developer with experience in building modern web applications using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I enjoy crafting clean, responsive UI/UX and writing maintainable code.

experience.description: Developed responsive websites and web applications for clients using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. Optimized UI/UX and application performance.
Assisted in building reusable UI components, implemented features, and gained experience with Agile methodology.
